Description: Seven beads made of different sizes and materials. A: Three cylindrical segmented beads made of white faience. B: One extended sphere bead made of faience, faint traces of light turquoise glazing. C: Three disc-shaped beads, made of faience, one is slightly larger with faint blue glaze, the two smaller ones are made of a greyish-greenish glaze.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
